body:
Declare @UrunTID Int
Declare csnp Cursor Local For
Select S.UrunTID From IT06_Stoklar S Where S.StokTipID = 40 And S.MuhasebeUrunKodu Like '%KR0%'
Open csnp
Fetch Next From csnp Into @UrunTID
While @@FETCH_STATUS=0 Begin

	Exec PSP06_Stoklar_MuhasebeEntegrasyon  @UrunTID = @UrunTID
		
	Fetch Next From csnp Into @UrunTID
End
Close csnp
Deallocate csnp
